subject: Football (College)
Diet and Nutrition
Athletics and Sports
Food
lead_paragraph: A survey of about two dozen programs found that average spending on food for Division I athletes had increased 145 percent since the N.C.A.A. lifted limitations on it in August 2014.
snippet: A survey of about two dozen programs found that average spending on food for Division I athletes had increased 145 percent since the N.C.A.A. lifted limitations on it in August 2014.
